CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1964, pg. 6, reads: "HOSTESSES This Sextet of pretty girls served as hostesses at the swank anniversary ball given by The Squaws last Friday night.  Left to right, first row: Donna Purnell of Bridgeville, Kay Fitts, and Claudette Stonwork of Campbell, Ohio.  Back row: Jeonine Watkins, Adelaide Montgomery and Sandra Ligons. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Squaws Club members wearing feathers in hair, first row from left: Donna Purnell, Kay Fitts, Claudette Stonwork; back row: Jeonine Watkins, Adelaide Montgomery, and Sandra Ligons, posed in Hilton Hotel
